Articles.Content:
Hey guys.

so I'm playing a completely stock game and I'm trying to build a shuttle but i still can't get any thing to connect to any of the nodes in side to cargo bays. is there a trick to this or is it a bug that need fixing. 

 

Thanks
Hi MissMolly, have you tried holding the alt key?  It disables surface attach which makes it much easier to fit parts to nodes.
Good Morning Sal thanks for your help not sure why i did not think of trying the Alt key, i did go and try it out thanks

Wow, best random tip I've ever hard. So annoying when things refuse to go where you want because they are trying to attach to every surface nearby.
